event.title: was moved from Fairfield to Raleigh in 1834

data.event: Raleigh was first established as the community of Indian Springs and was renamed when the county seat was moved from Fairfield to Raleigh in 1834.

event.title: 1863, Raleigh was part of Grierson's Raid which played

data.event: In 1863, Raleigh was part of Grierson's Raid which played a major role in the defeat of the Confederate Army at Vicksburg.
